kind.description: Identifies the API kind for this data

apiVersion.description: Identifies the API group name and version for this data

cachePruneMax.description: CachePruneMax is the maximum cache size after pruning in megabytes

cachePath.description: CachePath is the directory where the cache fields are stored

compressionLevel.description: CompressionLevel is the level used for compression.  Valid values are min, normal, max

editor.description: Editor is the text editor used for editing the files (e.g., ace-dt bottle edit)

chunkSize.description: ChunkSize is the maximum size of a chunk used to upload blobs. 0 disables chunking

concurrentHTTP.description: ConcurrentHTTP is the maximum number of HTTP requests that will be in flight at any given time. Must be positive.

registryAuthFile.description: RegistryAuthFile is the file to use for credentials to an OCI registry

endpoints.description:
Endpoints is a list of string endpoint URLs (with scheme included) that are mirrors to the original registry.
e.g., docker.io might have a mirror at https://example.mirror.com or http://localhost that the image can be pulled from instead of docker.io.

rewritePull.description: RewritePull to pull from a specified mirrored location that may be different from the original

additionalProperties.description: Registry contains the custom configuration for a registry.

insecureSkipVerify.description: InsecureSkipVerify skips the verification of the server's certificate (may allow MiTM attack so use sparingly).

additionalProperties.description: EndpointConfig contains the specified TLS configuration for an endpoint and the endpoint's referrers type.

registryConfig.description: RegistryConfig stores custom registry mapping and http client options.

hideProgress.description: HideProgress will disable the process bar if true

telemetry.description: Telemetry is a list of telemetry server locations

telemetryUserName.description: TelemetryUserName is the name of this user for reporting to telemetry

alias.description: Alias is the unique user-defined name for the key.

api.description: API used to access the key.

userid.description: Key owner's identity, typically a username for the KeyAPI.

keyid.description: Title of the key as indicated by the api.

items.description: SigningKey is metadata which is added to signature annotations when signing.

keys.description: SigningKeys is a list of signing key metadata.

Configuration.description: Configuration defines a set of configuration parameters.

v1alpha1.description: Version v1alpha1 of the API v1alpha1
